channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. consumer sentiment falls to lowest level since 2022

item.title: SEC votes to stop defending climate disclosure rules
item.description: Wall Street's top regulator said on Thursday it had voted to cease legal efforts to defend regulations that require companies to disclose climate-rela...

item.title: Trump withdraws nomination of Rep. Elise Stefanik for U.N. ambassador

item.title: U.S. stocks set to open lower after PCE gauge reflects persistence of inflation
This CEO may have cost his investors $661 million. Trump just pardoned him.
Greenland forms new government hours before visit by U.S. Vice President Vance
item.description: Greenland presented a new government coalition agreement on Friday, just hours before a visit by U.S. Vice President JD Vance to the Arctic island.

item.title: Russia's Putin says it would be a 'profound mistake' to dismiss Trump's push for Greenland
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned it would be foolish to dismiss U.S. President Donald Trump's push for control over Greenland.
